pli-tv-bu-vb-sk58:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk58:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū daṇḍapāṇissa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk58:7.1: “Na daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk58:9.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
